name: Don't Sink! (Hwijaya)
description:
Many things can go wrong while running a ship! Take control and try to not sink for as long as you can in this endless action game with randomly generated paths, obstacles and problems to fix each time you restart the game!

Originally made and submitted as the Project 2 of the Graphics and Interactions Subject at Unimelb by Group 43; Hans Wijaya, Tai Wai Kuan, Mohammed Emaad Ullah Beig and Ni Xi at 1 November 2021.

Known bugs:

1. Water shader issues

2. Difficulty level yet to be fine tuned

3. Choppy obstacle pop-ins and terrain generation

4. Performance issues on lower-end Hardware

5. Lighting issues (Game being generally dark)
